recap_documents.description: NOTICE OF FILING OF OFFICIAL TRANSCRIPT of Proceedings as to KHALED MIAH re SENTENCING HEARING held on October 18, 2022 before Judge W. Scott Hardy. Court Reporter Deborah Rowe, Telephone number 412-471-2510. E-mail: drowe.usdistrictcourt@verizon.net. The parties have seven (7) calendar days to file with the court a Notice of Intent to Request Redaction of this transcript. If no such Notice is filed, the transcript may be made remotely, electronically available to the public without redaction after 90 calendar days. For redaction purposes, or otherwise, during this 90 day period a copy of the transcript may be purchased from the court reporter or viewed at the clerk's office public terminal. Any Notice of Intent to Request Redaction and Redaction Request must be separately mailed to the court reporter of said proceedings. Notice of Intent for Redaction of Personal Data Identifiers due by 11/10/2022. Redaction Request due 11/25/2022. Redacted Transcript Deadline set for 12/5/2022. Release of Transcript Restriction set for 2/1/2023. (dsr) (Entered: 11/03/2022)
